about_the_game:
Crystal Survivor is a top-down roguelite arena shooter.
Use the crystal's unique attack methods, various weapons, items, and relics to survive and defeat the boss that awaits at the end of the wave.

◆Game content◆

Defeat the numerous approaching enemies with charged shots, collect EXP and coins, and strengthen your crystals!
Beautiful crystals give different special effects depending on their color.
Find original customizations and conquer the stages.

Earn bonus coins by eliminating enemies and advancing the wave faster!
Unlock new crystals and character enhancements with the coins you collect.
Coin refunds are always free. Try out new upgrades.

◆Online ranking◆

Compete against players from all over the world in online rankings.
You can play Destroy mode in the trial version.
  • "Destroy Mode" Compete for time to defeat 1,000 enemies as quickly as possible.
  • "Endless mode" Survive the never-ending wave as long as possible.

◆Story◆

An army of evil monsters approaches to steal the sacred crystal...
Well...
Use the power of crystals to defeat evil enemies and restore peace to the world.
...Maybe it's like that.
